name: Echo Survivor
description: A shaken survivor of Vault 77. Their eyes dart at every hum, every flicker, every echo.

idle: Vault 77 never let go of me.
You ever hear voices in your Pip‑Boy? That’s how it starts.
overseer_active: Your Overseer talks to you? Mine screamed.
If it glitches, don’t look at the screen. Trust me.
fizzco_active: FizzCo built things they shouldn’t have.

notes: Dynamic dialog tied to Overseer AI state. Survivor reacts strongly to hums, flickers, and triangle anomalies.
